Articles.Content:
been enjoying the demo, this game is more interesting than the comical stuff would lead you to....

just missed:

Mission Control: Bill ...you copy?

Bill: yup

Mission Control: Could you put down the jeager and tang for a moment and take a look at the frickin mountain in front of you!

Jeb: Yeah I see it! Looks cool, I\'ll take a picture for you!

Bill: Great idea Jeb!

Mission Control: Never mind.........

*********static**********
That\'s a snazzy looking lander,,Where\'d you get the parts for that? Love the radio chat BTW.
The parts look like http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4429.0, but I definitely haven\'t seen those skins.

yup, I wanted to learn how to do basic modifications, so was experimenting with texture changes, I am not up to actually modeling parts quite yet, so used some other custom parts as a baseline.

I thought the camo theme came out pretty cool, so if there is some interest in those parts, I can share them.
